## Step 2: Calculate initial inventory value
Since all purchases are dated 2023-12-31, these represent our initial inventory. Let's sum these up by product:

Basic Consulting (S001):
- 2000.0 (2 units)
- 1000.0 (1 unit)
- 1000.0 (1 unit)
- 3000.0 (3 units)
- 1000.0 (1 unit)
- 1000.0 (1 unit)
Total: 9,000.00 (9 units)

Standard Consulting (S002):
- 10000.0 (2 units)
- 10000.0 (2 units)
- 15000.0 (3 units)
Total: 35,000.00 (7 units)

Premium Consulting (S003):
- 20000.0 (1 unit)
- 60000.0 (3 units)
- 60000.0 (3 units)
- 20000.0 (1 unit)
- 20000.0 (1 unit)
- 40000.0 (2 units)
- 20000.0 (1 unit)
Total: 240,000.00 (12 units)

Enterprise Solution (S004):
- 200000.0 (2 units)
- 300000.0 (3 units)
- 200000.0 (2 units)
- 200000.0 (2 units)
- 200000.0 (2 units)
- 300000.0 (3 units)
Total: 1,400,000.00 (14 units)

Total initial inventory: 9,000 + 35,000 + 240,000 + 1,400,000 = 1,684,000.00
